text: This is a list of chapters of both the Alpha Delta Phi Fraternity, and the Alpha Delta Phi Society, which split from the fraternity in 1992. == Fraternity == As of April 2017, the fraternity has 31 chapters and 3 affiliates.Chapters and Affiliates (active and inactive) – Alpha Delta Phi, accessed 3 August 2014. === Active chapters === {| class="sortable wikitable" |- ! It currently has 7 active chartered chapters, 3 graduate chapters, and 2 affiliate chapters.Chapters & Affiliates - The Alpha Delta Phi Society - Alpha Delta Phi Society, accessed 27 May 2020 ===Chapters=== * Binghamton Chapter, Binghamton University – Vestal, NY (founded 2011) * Brunonian Chapter, Brown University – Providence, RI (founded 1836) * Capital Chapter, George Washington University – Washington, DC (founded 2014) * Columbia Chapter, Columbia University – New York, NY (founded 1836) * Middletown Chapter, Wesleyan University – Middletown, CT (founded 1856) * Penn Chapter, University of Pennsylvania – Philadelphia, PA (founded 2010) * Rensselaer Chapter, Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute - Troy, NY (founded 2015) ===Graduate chapters=== * Bowdoin Graduate Chapter, Bowdoin College – Brunswick, ME (founded 1841) * Granite Graduate Chapter, University of New Hampshire – Durham, NH (founded 2010) * Stanford Graduate Chapter, Stanford University – Palo Alto, CA (founded 1916) ===Affiliates=== * New Leaf Affiliate, Indiana State University – Terre Haute, IN (founded 2019) * Ursinian Affiliate, Ursinus College – Collegeville, PA (founded 2015), also known as "the Adelphi Society" ==References== Alpha Delta Phi Category:Alpha Delta Phi
